remarks: Perform induction over the structure of a word.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
statement:
wrdind.1 $e |- ( x = (/) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
wrdind.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
wrdind.3 $e |- ( x = ( y ++ <" z "> ) -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
wrdind.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ta ) ) $.
wrdind.5 $e |- ps $.
wrdind.6 $e |- ( ( y e. Word B /\ z e. B ) -> ( ch -> th ) ) $.
wrdind $p |- ( A e. Word B -> ta ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y z $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
